faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our surfskate hall

questions.question: What equipment is included in the price?
questions.answer: All necessary protective equipment (helmet, knee pads, wrist guards) and a surfskate board are included. You only need to bring sportswear.

questions.question: How does access to the hall work?
questions.answer: After successful booking and payment, you will automatically receive a 6-digit PIN code via email. You can use this code to enter the hall during your booked time.

questions.question: Can I cancel my booking?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your booking free of charge up to 24 hours before the appointment. For more short-term cancellations, a processing fee will be charged.

questions.question: Are there age restrictions?
questions.answer: Our hall is suitable for all age groups. Children under 16 require parental consent.

questions.question: What happens if there are technical problems?
questions.answer: If you have problems with access, you can reach our support at the provided phone number. We will help you quickly and easily.
